name: Lisa Strelein
biography: Dr Lisa Strelein ('Native Title') is a visiting research fellow in the Native Title Research Unit of the Australian Institute of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Studies. She completed her undergraduate degrees in law and commerce at Murdoch University and her PhD in law at the Australian National University. Dr Strelein has published widely on native title and related issues and is the principal editor of the series 'Land, Rights, Laws: Issues in Native Title'. She now conducts research on the legal concept of native title and self-government issues, working closely with native title representative bodies.
